Package it.univpm.twitter_trends

Class DataManagerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.univpm.twitter_trends.DataManagerService
  • public class DataManagerService
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that manages the data requests of the server and handles periodical saving and archiving the trends

                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the unfiltered TrendCollection of the specified date.
        Parameters:
        date - the date of the desired TrendCollection
        Returns:
        the unfiltered TrendCollection of the date
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the trends of the date are not present in the archive

      • getFilteredTrendCollection

        public TrendCollection getFilteredTrendCollection​(java.lang.String date,
                                                  java.lang.String expression)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the TrendCollection of the selected date, filtered by the expression
        Parameters:
        date - the desired date of the trends
        expression - the filter expression
        Returns:
        the filtered TrendCollection
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - can be thrown if the date is not present or if the expression is not valid

      • getAvailableDates

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAvailableDates()
        Returns the available dates in the archive. This is used for displaying purposes in the home page form
